title: Waistcoat, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: silk, metal threads, sequins
Technique: satin weave, embroidered with silk and metal threads
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Waistcoat of white satin, embroidered with polychrome silks, metal threads, and sequins. Scene of small sailing vessels, one firing on a tower. Border of drums and flags.

tombstone.epitaph:
Waistcoat, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Medium: silk, metal threads, sequins
Technique: satin weave, embroidered with silk and metal threads. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-54-29.
